instruction: Analyze the impact of the given statement on the environment.
input: A majority of transportation has transitioned to electricity from petrol or diesel.
output: This shift from petrol or diesel to electricity in transportation has had a positive environmental impact, resulting in fewer emissions of greenhouse gases and pollutants. Additionally, electric engines produce fewer sounds and vibrations, creating a quieter atmosphere. The electric vehicles also tend to be more fuel efficient than their petrol and diesel counterparts.
